subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen, a former member of the Celtics’ Big Three, hit a 3-pointer to send Game 6 of the N.B.A. finals into overtime and perhaps save Miami’s Big Three.
snippet: Ray Allen, a former member of the Celtics’ Big Three, hit a 3-pointer to send Game 6 of the N.B.A. finals into overtime and perhaps save Miami’s Big Three.
